property.name: createOpr
property.value: create memory table businessentity(id bigint GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1) ,name varchar(100) not null,url varchar(200),description varchar(200),domain varchar(200),primary key(id));

property.name: getOpr
property.value: select * from classrelation_{} where src='{}' and classrelationtype='{}';

property.name: createMemOpr
property.value: create memory table businessentity_{}(id bigint GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1) ,name varchar(100) not null,url varchar(200),description varchar(200),domain varchar(200),primary key(id));

property.name: createFileOpr
property.value: create table businessentity_{}(id bigint not null auto_increment,name varchar(100) not null,url varchar(200),description varchar(200),domain varchar(200),primary key(id));

property.name: getIgnoreJobOpr
property.value: select distinct name,description,url,addition_info,wsdl_url,wsdl_path,businessId from services_-1 where url='{}';

property.name: createMemOpr
property.value: create memory table services_{}(id bigint GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1) , name varchar(100) not null,description varchar(200),url varchar(200) not null,addition_info varchar(200),wsdl_url varchar(100) not null,wsdl_path varchar(100) not null,businessId bigint not null,primary key(id),foreign key(businessId) references BusinessEntity_{}(id) on delete cascade);

property.name: createFileOpr
property.value: create table services_{}(id bigint not null auto_increment,name varchar(100) not null,description varchar(200),url varchar(200) not null,addition_info text,wsdl_url varchar(100) not null,wsdl_path varchar(100) not null,businessId bigint not null,primary key(id),foreign key(businessId) references BusinessEntity_{}(id) on delete cascade);

property.name: createMemOpr
property.value: create memory table jars_{}(id bigint GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1) , name varchar(100) not null,path varchar(100) not null,url varchar(200) not null,description varchar(200),version varchar(100),projectId bigint not null,primary key(id),foreign key(projectId) references Projects_{}(id) on delete cascade);

property.value: create memory table classes_{}(id bigint GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1) , name varchar(100) not null,path varchar(100) not null,url varchar(200) not null,description varchar(200),version varchar(100),projectId bigint not null,primary key(id),foreign key(projectId) references Projects_{}(id) on delete cascade);

property.name: createMemOpr
property.value: create memory table jobs(id bigint,start_time datetime not null,end_time datetime not null,description varchar(200),primary key(id));

property.name: getMaxOpr
property.value: select * from jobs where id=(select max(id) from jobs);

property.name: createMemOpr
property.value: create memory table projects_{}(id bigint GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1) ,name varchar(100) not null,url varchar(200),description varchar(200),owner varchar(200),primary key(id));

property.name: createFileOpr
property.value: create table projects_{}(id bigint not null auto_increment,name varchar(100) not null,url varchar(200) not null,description varchar(200),owner varchar(200),primary key(id));

property.name: createFileOpr
createFileOpr
property.value: create table businessentity_-1(id bigint not null auto_increment,name varchar(100) not null,url varchar(200),description varchar(200),domain varchar(200),primary key(id)); create table services_-1(id bigint not null auto_increment,name varchar(100) not null,description varchar(200),url varchar(200) not null,addition_info text,wsdl_url varchar(100) not null,wsdl_path varchar(100) not null,businessId bigint not null,primary key(id),foreign key(businessId) references BusinessEntity_-1(id) on delete cascade);
